statements: SELECT * FROM BacteriaSequencingData;
SELECT id, bacteria_name, sequencing_date FROM BacteriaSequencingData WHERE sequencing_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT dna_sequence FROM BacteriaSequencingData WHERE bacteria_name = 'E. coli';
SELECT id, analysis_result->'is_pathogenic' AS is_pathogenic FROM BacteriaSequencingData WHERE analysis_result->>'confidence_score' > '0.8';
SELECT id, bacteria_name, sequencing_date FROM BacteriaSequencingData ORDER BY sequencing_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, bacteria_name, dna_sequence, sequencing_date, analysis_result FROM BacteriaSequencingData;
SELECT * FROM BacteriaSequencingData WHERE bacteria_name = 'E. coli';
SELECT id, bacteria_name, dna_sequence FROM BacteriaSequencingData WHERE sequencing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BacteriaSequencingData ORDER BY sequencing_date DESC;
SELECT id, bacteria_name, analysis_result->>'mutation' AS mutation_type FROM BacteriaSequencingData WHERE analysis_result->'mutation_count' > 10;
SELECT * FROM bacteria_genomes;
SELECT species_name FROM bacteria_genomes WHERE genome_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT genome_id, species_name FROM bacteria_genomes ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT result_id, result_data FROM analysis_results ORDER BY result_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM bacteria_genomes WHERE species_name = 'E.coli';
SELECT genome_id, species_name FROM bacteria_genomes WHERE species_name ILIKE 'b%';
SELECT * FROM analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT genome_id, COUNT(result_id) AS num_results FROM analysis_results GROUP BY genome_id HAVING COUNT(result_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM bacteria_genomes JOIN analysis_results ON bacteria_genomes.genome_id = analysis_results.genome_id WHERE result_data ->> 'status' = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM bacteria_genomes;
SELECT genome_id, species FROM bacteria_genomes WHERE species = 'E. coli';
SELECT experiment_date, results FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM bacteria_genomes WHERE species LIKE '%bacter%';
SELECT * FROM bacteria_genomes WHERE genome_id = 'ABC123';
SELECT species, sequence_data FROM bacteria_genomes ORDER BY species DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE bacteria_id = 'XYZ789' AND results LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT genome_id, species, LENGTH(sequence_data) AS data_length FROM bacteria_genomes WHERE LENGTH(sequence_data) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Bacteria;
SELECT name, genetic_code FROM Bacteria WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Samples ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_date, result_data FROM Experiments WHERE sample_id = 3;
SELECT result_value, result_description FROM Results WHERE experiment_id = 5 ORDER BY result_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Bacteria;
SELECT name, genetic_code FROM Bacteria WHERE genetic_code = 'ATCG';
SELECT * FROM Samples JOIN Bacteria ON Samples.source_bacteria_id = Bacteria.id;
SELECT result_id, result_value, result_description FROM Results WHERE result_value > 5 ORDER BY result_value DESC;

SELECT Bacteria.name, Samples.sample_date, Samples.sample_type FROM Samples JOIN Bacteria ON Samples.source_bacteria_id = Bacteria.id WHERE Samples.sample_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY Samples.sample_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM bacteria_genomes;
SELECT genome_id, species_name FROM bacteria_genomes ORDER BY genome_id DESC;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, gene_sequence FROM bacterial_genes WHERE gene_id = 3;
SELECT function_name FROM gene_functions WHERE function_id = 1;
SELECT g.gene_name, a.function_id, f.function_name FROM bacterial_genes g JOIN gene_annotations a ON g.gene_id = a.gene_id JOIN gene_functions f ON a.function_id = f.function_id;
SELECT * FROM bacteria_genomes;
SELECT gene_name, gene_sequence FROM bacterial_genes WHERE genome_id = 1;
SELECT function_name FROM gene_functions WHERE function_id = 1;
SELECT g.gene_name, g.gene_sequence, f.function_name FROM bacterial_genes g JOIN gene_annotations ga ON g.gene_id = ga.gene_id JOIN gene_functions f ON ga.function_id = f.function_id;
SELECT v.variation_id, v.variation_type, v.variation_description, g.gene_name, g.genome_id FROM gene_variations v JOIN bacterial_genes g ON v.gene_id = g.gene_id ORDER BY v.variation_id DESC;
